backend/main.mo: Motoko canister managing user profiles, school data, access control, and daily performance reports with admin and user role checks.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of various frontend source files for reference.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles and CSS variables defining light and dark theme color tokens.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point loading the React app and defining metadata and favicon.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app component handling authentication, role-based routing, and admin view switching.
frontend/src/components/admin/ActiveScho: Admin section listing active schools with search, filtering, edit dialog, and loading/error states.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminSumma: Displays two summary cards showing active school count and number of reports for a selected date, with loading states.
frontend/src/components/admin/AnalyticsS: Generates completion and trend analytics from today’s reports and renders line and pie charts, with skeletons while loading.
frontend/src/components/admin/DailyProgr: Shows badges indicating completion status of various daily report categories based on scores and photo availability.
frontend/src/components/admin/EditSchool: Dialog form for editing a school’s profile, prefilled from SchoolSummary and saved using a mutation with validation and error handling.
frontend/src/components/admin/KepsekProf: Form to register or update a principal’s school profile by submitting principal ID and school details, with validation and toast feedback.
frontend/src/components/admin/Monitoring: Fetches, sorts, and displays daily monitoring rows in a table with scores, status, and detail view selection, handling loading and empty states.
frontend/src/components/admin/ReportDeta: Displays detailed daily report info in a dialog, including photos, times, scores, and notes for each category.
frontend/src/components/AppHeader.tsx: Header with branding, optional child actions, and logout that clears identity and query cache.
frontend/src/components/kepsek/Attendanc: Handles image file selection, validation, upload progress, and preview for attendance photos.
frontend/src/components/kepsek/DailyRepo: Form for creating or editing a daily report with autosave, time conversion, photo upload, and multiple score categories.
frontend/src/components/kepsek/ProfileSe: Form dialog for entering and saving initial school profile details such as name, region, and principal.
frontend/src/components/kepsek/TodaySubm: Shows a submitted daily report summary with photo, times, notes, and scores, and allows editing.
frontend/src/components/StatusPills.tsx: Reusable badge components showing score levels, submission status, and category scores with color coding.
frontend/src/constants/branding.ts: Provides centralized constants for application logos, icons, and alt text.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages the backend actor based on user identity, refreshing dependent queries when identity changes.
Provides a debounced callback hook that delays execution until after a specified timeout.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements an Internet Identity React context and provider with login, logout, state management, and AuthClient setup.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for roles, schools, profiles, and related mutations using an ICP actor and identity.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining light/dark theme variables and base utility styles.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Provides a utility function to merge class names using clsx and tailwind-merge.
frontend/src/localization/dashboardId.ts: Contains centralized Indonesian localization strings for admin and kepsek dashboards.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app by wrapping it with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/AccessDeniedPage.tsx: Renders an access denied screen with principal ID display, logout, and retry role-check actions.
frontend/src/pages/AdminDashboardPage.ts: Admin dashboard page showing monitoring data, reports download, analytics, school management, and summary sections.
frontend/src/pages/AdminKepsekManagement: Provides an admin interface to register and manage school principals, showing a form toggle to create a new school profile.
frontend/src/pages/KepsekDashboardPage.t: Renders the Kepsek dashboard with school data, daily report viewing/editing, date selection, and error/loading handling.
frontend/src/pages/LoginPage.tsx: Displays a login screen allowing users to authenticate using Internet Identity.
frontend/src/utils/candidOption.ts: Utility helpers for unwrapping Candid optional values and working with optional ExternalBlob URLs.
frontend/src/utils/dayKey.ts: Provides timezone-safe helpers for converting dates to day-key nanoseconds and formatting/parsing date inputs.
frontend/src/utils/reportDownload.ts: Generates and downloads daily monitoring data as a CSV file, formatting values and timestamps appropriately.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters using query strings and sessionStorage.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration defining dark mode, content paths, extended color palette, custom animations, and plugin usage.
project_state.json: Project state metadata listing issues and pending feature requests focused on updating branding assets and applying new logos across the app.
